title: Peer/Self-assessment Simulation Training to Strengthen Fairness in Group Work Evaluation

context.prior_knowledge: Expert-level knowledge and experience in solving complex problems
context.additional_context: An assessment fairness training program for pre-service teachers to strengthen language education expertise. Operates group work evaluation scenarios simulating real classroom situations in VR environments

learning_goals: Learners can accurately measure their group work participation to at least 80% using peer assessment and self-assessment tools.
Three evaluation criteria can be designed to enhance fairness perception in VR simulation environments
Can provide peer feedback on assessment results with over 90% completeness according to a structured template.
difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
